content.question: Which of the following circuits dissipates energy at the same rate as the circuit shown above?

choices.label: The figure presents a 6 volt battery in series with three 5 ohm resistors.
The figure presents a 6 volt battery in series with two 10 ohm resistors.
The figure presents a 6 volt battery in series with a 2 ohm resistor that is connected to two 6 ohm resistors in parallel.

This figure presents a 6 volt battery in series with a 5 ohm resistor, which is connected to two 5 ohm resistors in parallel. That configuration is connected by to a 5 ohm resistor and then the battery.
The figure presents a 6 volt battery in parallel with a 5 ohm resistor and a 10 ohm resistor.

content.answer: The figure presents a 6 volt battery in series with a 2 ohm resistor that is connected to two 6 ohm resistors in parallel.

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
